name: ThunderStrike (itch)
description:
Prepare to fully upgrade your arsenal of weapons to defeat your enemies with thunderstrike speed. Battle through 13 action-packed intense waves and see if you will be victorious.

How To Play

  • WASD to move
  • Press or hold the spacebar to shoot
  • Press Q to slow time down
  • Collecting Powerups upgrades your weapon and increases health. How many upgrades can you get? Play to find out.
  • Slow down time ability is also upgraded when you collect a powerup. This can't be used on weapon level 1
  • For a less laggy experience, download the pc version.
